quest.name: The Road Home
journal: Slowly but surely, Alphinaud is regaining his composure.
objectives: Search for wounded soldiers in need of assistance.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I promise...

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: No, no, no! You can't! Not now... <sniffle> <sob>

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Forgive me. Now is not the time for vows of vengeance. We must remain calm and rational and in control.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The imperials have demonstrated a willingness to fire on their own. So long as we remain here, we are in danger.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We three will see to Commander Kemp's body. Find my sister and return to Ala Ghiri.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We'll look after him. You should go.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: <sniffle> <sob>

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will meet you in Ala Ghiri. I pray you find my sister and leave at once.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There, that should suffice for now. Go on and join the others.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Tell me you've found Alphinaud. Tell me he is all right.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh, thank the Twelve! I don't know what I would have done... Though, saying that, what will the Resistance do without Commander Kemp?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Sorry─not here, not now. We should return to Ala Ghiri. Keep an eye out for any wounded who need our help on the way.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER
dialogue.text: Oh, oh, bless you, kind─ Wait, is that you, Forename?

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER
dialogue.text: I didn't recognize you at first. Been feeling a bit dizzy. Must've lost a lot of blood. I...I can keep going. I can keep going...

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER
dialogue.text: Go on without me, Forename. I'll not be long.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB
dialogue.text: ...Thanks, friend. Bloody tourniquet came loose and I was having trouble getting it back on. I should be fine the rest of the way.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB
dialogue.text: I can manage on my own. Reckon you've got more important things to do than watch over a poor sod like me.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> ...It wasn't long ago I was trying to kill you and yours. I half expected you were about to slit my throat.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: To hells with this. I should be back home in Ilsabard, instead of taking fire from my so-called comrades.

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: Put me in a gaol or wherever─I'm through with it. Do you hear me? I surrender!

dialogue.name: WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERC
dialogue.text: What should we do? We've got plenty of our own wounded to deal with. Say the word and I'll finish him quick!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: It's up to all of us to carry on in his stead. It's up to me...

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: I knew we'd lose people doing this, but him...? I was sure the old bear would outlast us all.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I did what I could for those I found along the way...but some were beyond help.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: ...No need to say it. I heard.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: We lost a lot of men inside the tower. Casualties are still mounting among those who survived.

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: The Elder Seedseer has been informed. By the grace of the Matron, mayhap we can yet save more lives...

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: Whatever “rules of war” can be said to exist, that whoreson has broken them all. This will not stand!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename. We have given over Commander Kemp's remains for safekeeping. Later─I have no idea when─rites must needs be performed...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: For now, however, we must carry on. We must press forward. We must not give in to despair...

obj.n: For the Living and the Dead
